alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 11:32PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Gusty winds will create areas of drifting snow and icy roads through Tuesday morning... Strong winds of 15 to 30 mph, with gusts up to 35 to 40 mph will continue overnight and into Tuesday morning. Some locations, like in Humboldt county, could see winds gusting from 50 to 60 mph. This will cause snow to drift back on to some roads, especially in open areas, which could cause icy roads. Please use caution when traveling. The winds will decrease on Tuesday afternoon. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
